name: Firehouse Shredded Beef
description: Hungry bellies? Nothing like a hearty, beefy dish to turn 'em into happy bellies. Take a couple minutes to prep the roast, then let your slow cooker do its thing. This is a great solution to any of your meal prep woes.
preparation: Cut roast lengthwise into 3" thick slices. Heat oil in Sauté Pan and brown beef 2 min per side.
In a slow cooker, combine seasoning with broth and tomato paste. Place beef in slow cooker, turning to coat with seasoning mixture. Cover and cook on low 6 hrs.
Remove beef from slow cooker onto a cutting board. Using two forks, shred beef. Add shredded beef back into slow cooker and stir to combine with sauce.
Serve in tacos, burritos, sandwiches, rice bowls, and more.
tips: Swap 3 lbs (1.3 kg) boneless, skinless chicken for beef.
Swap water for beef broth and add salt, to taste, before serving.

products.name: Cincinnati Chili Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: More of a meaty topping than a traditional stew, Cincinnati Chili is sweet, savoury, and subtly spicy and traditionally served piled on spaghetti with tons of toppings. This one is all about versatility and is served in different “ways.” Try it Two-Way with just the chili topping and spaghetti — this is the base. To make it Three-Way, add cheese, Four-Way, add onions, or Five-Way by adding kidney beans. Any way, it’s sure to be the talk of your next game day gathering or family get-together!

products.name: Better Than Beef Broth Mix
summary: You won’t believe it’s not beef! This vegan/plant-based broth mix is packed with beefy flavour, mushroom and inactive nutritional yeast powders, and organic tamari powder. Ready in minutes, this one-step broth creates a rich base for your favourite soups and can be used anywhere you want to “beef” things up!

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.
